FAQ.title: FAQs
FAQ.reset_password: How can I reset my password?
FAQ.reset_password_answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click on "Forgot Password". Follow the instructions to reset it.
FAQ.profile_picture: How do I change my profile picture?
FAQ.profile_picture_answer: To change your profile picture, go to "Account Information" and select "Edit Profile".
FAQ.dark_mode: Can I switch to dark mode?
FAQ.dark_mode_answer: Yes! You can toggle dark mode on or off in the settings under "Dark Mode".

DeleteAccount.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

Logout.confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?
